name: Properties
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Properties
description:
Properties

A set of properties about an image, such as the image’s dominant colors.

See Google::Cloud::Vision::Image#properties.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/logo.jpg"

properties = image.properties
properties.colors.count #=> 10

methods.name: colors
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Properties#colors
methods.description: The image’s dominant colors, including their corresponding scores.

returns.description: An array of the image’s dominant colors.
